thread.title: Hundreds march against corruption in Cape Town
thread.title_full: Hundreds march against corruption in Cape Town | News24

author: news24.com
title: Hundreds march against corruption in Cape Town
text:
Cape Town - Hundreds of people gathered in the Cape Town CBD on Wednesday to participate in a march against corruption.
- Are you there? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
Community leaders and programme organisers addressed the crowd planning to march to Parliament at noon as the rain came down.
"We here today because we need to raise our voices. Enough is enough!" programme manager Miles Giljam said to cheers from the gathered crowd.
